title: Mueller Preview, Debt Deal, Cannabis Regulation
itunes:title: Mueller Preview, Debt Deal, Cannabis Regulation
description:
Panel guests include: Capri Cafaro, Executive in Residence at American University, and Former Ohio Senate Democratic minority leader and Tyler Deaton, Republican strategist, fundraiser, and President of Allegiance Strategies.

Kevin also spoke to Brady Cobb, CEO and Director, SOL Global Investments Corp about cannabis regulation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
